docs.title: ezapi-icc-pro
docs.text: A Python wrapper for ICC PRO RESTful API

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
from icc_pro import ICC_PRO
host = "..."
username = "..."
password = "..."
client_id = "..."
client_secret = "..."
iccpro = ICC_PRO(host, username, password, client_id, client_secret)

See detailed usages at Endpoints page.
